headline: Guggenheim Lifts Palo Alto Networks (PANW) Rating Following Deal Activity and AI Tailwinds
summary: Palo Alto Networks, Inc. (NASDAQ:PANW) is one of the AI Stocks Making Waves on Wall Street. On January 4, Guggenheim analyst John DiFucci upgraded the stock from Sell to “Neutral,” noting that the stock’s underperformance, recent deal activity, and industry leadership in Free Cash Flow margins have reset valuation and improved PANW’s risk-reward profile. “We […]

headline: Palo Alto Networks (PANW) Valuation Check After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: Palo Alto Networks (PANW) is back on investors’ radar after recent trading left the stock about 6.5% lower over the past month and roughly 14.7% lower over the past 3 months, prompting fresh interest in its valuation. See our latest analysis for Palo Alto Networks. Looking beyond the recent pullback, Palo Alto Networks’ 30 day share price return of a 6.5% decline and 90 day share price return of a 14.7% decline contrast with a positive year to date share price return of 3.6%. The 1 year total...
